message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $140. I think it would be a great deal for you at this price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. I'm looking to save some money on this purchase.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $135?
I'm getting close to your price, but I was thinking more like $132. I really like the product, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
